author: Couple's second chance shows how love outlasts death
title: Photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in president's chair raises eyebrows
text:
BREAKING NEWS: Embattled Trump National Security Adviser Michael Flynn resigns Photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in president's chair raises eyebrows CBS News 1 hr ago Â© @ivankatrump ivankachair.png NEW YORK -- A photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in the presidentâ€™s Oval Office chair has raised some eyebrows on Twitter.
The picture, which Ivanka tweeted on Monday, shows her sitting in the chair with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and her father, President Donald Trump , standing behind her.
â€œA great discussion with two world leaders about the importance of women having a seat at the table!â€ she tweeted with the picture.
